attributes.action: Scrap the Kyoto Protocol, lower green taxes and spend money on adaptation to future climate rather than CO2 restrictions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Earth's climate is always changing. Regardless of the future climate, we will need to adapt to any major changes. CO2 restrictions are futile because any attempts at reduction will be negated by natural temperature increases that release CO2 from oceans, soil and forests.
